"A.D.2028/4/17/14:30":
"What's wrong, <%me>?
You suddenly stopped."
"1. Something's wrong..."
"2. Time is repeating itself?"
"What do you mean, \"something's wrong?\" We haven't even fought any enemies yet, you're too quick to panic...."
"Time is repeating itself? What do you mean? Did something happen? I haven't even seen any enemies yet..."
"Wait... have we already encountered the enemy? You're saying... we've fought them over and over? What does that even mean?!"
"Xiera? Hey, Xiera! ...I can't get through to the outside!"
"Useless. This area of mine is a playground that repeats time. It blocks communication with the outside world."
"If only you'd been oblivious, wandering around in that fairy tale, this would have been 100% easier... What a 70% waste."
"Anyway, they figured this out earlier than we expected."
"The preparation for this field took so long... To think you'd figure it out this fast... It's strange, very strange."
"Have you already experienced something like this before? Och was right, you're such a weird person."
"So it's you two who are carrying out this farce. You don't seem like the type to remove the trick, being such show-offs."
"If you want to stop it, by all means, use your power. Though, I would never allow you to do such a thing."
"And I've gotten 60% tired just watching you, so we're going to crush you ourselves."
"Especially you, <%me>... You'd be 100% dangerous if left alone. I know for certain you'd get in Mother's way."
"Not to mention that Laplace and Maxwell would like to repay you for last time!"
"<%me>... You're very dangerous. And you give me a very bad feeling."
"You're almost certain to become a hindrance to Mother. Yes, I've already noted that."
"We won't forgive anyone for getting in Mother's way! We'll eliminate you, 100%!"
"Remove all of Mother's obstacles. That is our role. Our duty. Something so obvious need not be noted."
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of the Sun! Och Miller!"
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of the Moon. Phul Janice Lasswitz."
"100% isn't enough! We're going to fight at 200% power! This life, this power, it's all for Mother's sake!"
"If you turn the page of a book, the story repeats. Again and again and again. Until the day Mother smiles."
